strapiGuide.title: NWA Daily's Guide to Brunch in Bentonville, AR
strapiGuide.description: Discover the best brunch spots in Bentonville, Arkansas! From The Hive's creative and innovative dishes to Crepes Paulette's delicious crêpes, these restaurants offer a unique and delicious brunch experience. Whether it's a special occasion or just a casual morning adventure, these brunch options are sure to impress. Get your taste buds ready for a culinary journey with our guide to Bentonville's brunch scene.
strapiGuide.content:
Are you looking for a tasty brunch spot in Bentonville? Look no further! From classic southern dishes to creative twists on traditional meals, Bentonville has something for everyone. Whether you're looking for a fancy brunch with beautiful views or a casual spot to grab a bite with friends, these restaurants are sure to impress. From the Fried Chicken and Bubbles combo at The Hive to the la Classic Crepe at Crepes Paulette, these brunch spots have something for everyone to enjoy. So grab your friends, family, or a good book, and head to one of these delicious brunch spots in Bentonville!

Bentonville

 The Hive

📍200 NE A St

Photo Courtesy of The Hive

Located inside the award-winning 21c Hotel Museum, The Hive prides itself on creativity and innovation, showcasing some of Arkansas’ classic culinary features in new and exciting ways. Try the Fried Chicken and Bubbles combo (chicken & biscuits with your choice of 3 fruit juices to add to bubbly wine) or something more traditional like the French toast entree.

Instagram - Facebook


Louise

📍2205 SW I St.

Photo Courtesy of Louise

Named after Iris Louise McPhetridge Thaden, one of the greatest aviatrixes of all time, Louise Thaden serves phenomenal fresh food with incredible views of the airfield. Bring the kids for a fun morning watching the planes take off and land, or bring a book and hang out while you try the OZ1 Omelet!

Instagram - Facebook


Table Mesa (Weekend)

📍110 East W Central Ave.

Photo Courtesy of Table Mesa

After you’ve done your farmer’s market shopping, pop into Table Mesa for what might become your favorite brunch place in Bentonville! If you’re looking for a unique experience for a special occasion or just a classy morning adventure, Table Mesa’s Sunday brunch might be right up your alley. Brunch starts at 8a and ends at 11a.

Instagram - Facebook


Crepes Paulette

📍100 SW 8th St.

Photo Courtesy of Crepes Paulette

If you’re looking for something new and handheld for brunch, check out the la Classic or the la Spinach crêpes from Crêpes Paulette, or if you’re looking for something sweeter for brunch try the fan-favorite Nutella and banana crêpe! A crêpe in one hand, mimosa in the other, soaking in the sunshine, can a morning get any better?

Instagram - Facebook


 Pressroom (Weekend)

📍100 NW 2nd St.

Photo Courtesy of Pressroom

Don’t miss out on Pressroom’s weekend brunch specials, packed with options for those wanting to lean towards the breakfast side or the lunch side of brunch with fantastic shareable plates to bring the table together. Relax into Pressroom’s atmosphere and bring the whole table together this weekend.

Instagram - Facebook

Bentonville has a lot to offer when it comes to brunch options. From classic southern fried chicken and biscuits at The Hive, to unique crêpes at Crepes Paulette, there's something for everyone. Take in the beautiful views of the airfield at Louise, or relax with a mimosa at Table Mesa. Whether you're looking for a casual brunch or a special occasion, these spots are sure to please. So gather your friends and family, and head out to explore the brunch scene in Bentonville!
